name: Midas mAPOLLO
description: mAPOLLO is a tokenised certificate issued by Midas, structured to reference the performance of selected multi-chain stablecoin yield strategies managed by Apollo Crypto Fund. Apollo is an award-winning digital asset manager with a multi-strategy mandate focused on assets building new financial infrastructure. mAPOLLO is designed to provide on-chain access to market-neutral and diversified DeFi strategies.
